dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 60.5 x 42 cm (23 13/16 x 16 9/16 in.)
Repeat H (half-drop): 37.5 cm (14 3/4 in.)
title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: plain weave foundation. Block-printed: red and black. Yellow and blue too faded to determine method of application.
description: Bunch of flower enclosed in a thin wreath from which is hung a parrot seated in a hoop. Toned (picotage) background.
name: Fragment
